question: dream - i saw him in a field full of flowers playing with his father, whom he had never met before
answer:
QUESTION

He was running around the fields (he was unable to move when he was alive). is there any other meaning otherthan the abvious??
ANSWER

The meaning of the dream is certainly the obvious - enjoying the bounties of
Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
